poster.title: Ask.Fi
poster.description: The coolest financial assistant at your fingertips

data.title: No more scratching your head over expenses
data.description: Get insights into your spending across bank accounts & merchants. Just type - “Uber spends in 2022” or “Shopping spends for the month”.

data.title: Your tour guide across the app
data.description: Looking for something? Ask.Fi anything from “Show debit card offers” to “Where can I get my account statement?”

data.title: Get straight answers to simple questions
data.description: Get answers to “What’s my Savings Account number”, “What is my IFSC code”, and more in a jiffy!

data.title: Your wish is our command
data.description: You can Ask.Fi to “Pay Priyal”, “Open a Smart Deposit”, “Download Statement”, or “Invest in Mutual Funds”. One command and you’re sorted!

data.title: Need help? Ask.Fi to the rescue!
data.description: Have questions about your account? Ask.Fi anything from “What’s my KYC status“, “How do I order a cheque book“ to “How do I change my card settings?“

data.title: Have more questions?
data.description: Check out our FAQs.

data.title: All your info in one place
data.description: Connect all your bank accounts to Fi. Accurately view, track, and analyse your balances & spends across bank accounts.

data.title: Your data security is serious business
data.description: Via the Account Aggregator framework, your data is fetched safely. Plus, all your data is end-to-end encrypted.

data.title: Informative, but make it fun
data.description: Food? Clothes? Home-Decor? Where do you tend to spend the most? Let our Analyser get you answers to life’s big questions.

data.title: Curated Mutual Fund collections
data.description: Choose from a range of fund collections that suit every kind of investor, beginner or not.

data.title: DIY Filters
data.description: Know exactly what you’re looking for? Use the 60+ filters on the app to find your perfect investment! Filter by risk, expense, fund type, and more.

data.title: Make your own SIPs
data.description: Let us take care of your recurring investments. Automate your daily, weekly, or monthly investment using FIT rules.

data.title: The smartest calculator in town
data.description: Our Mutual Funds calculator tells you how much and how frequently you need to invest to reach your future goals.

data.info_text:
Mutual Fund investments are subject to market risks. Read all scheme-related documents carefully.
Past performance is not an indicator of future returns.

data.title: Have more questions?
data.description: Check out our FAQs.

poster.title: Payments
poster.description: We’ve got a buffet of payment modes for you to choose from – this includes UPI, Direct-to-Bank, Debit Card, IMPS, and more. Best part? You get rewarded for making payments on Fi!

list.title: 0 FOREX charge 🌏
list.content: Zero Forex on Select Plans. Enjoy international payments at no extra cost.

list.title: Payments with a Tap ✨
list.content: Use the ‘Tap and Pay’ feature to make contactless payments.

list.title: Card offers that you’ll love 💳
list.content: The Debit Card is a heavyweight when it comes to offers.

list.title: Card controls on your phone 📱
list.content: Tap and freeze your card from the app, and unfreeze it just as easily. Have trouble sticking to your budget? Set transaction limits for your card from the app as well.

list.title: Scan and Pay ↗️
list.content: Pay at stores, or send money directly to contacts by scanning and paying using the QR code scanner in your Fi app.

list.title: Rewards on every spend
list.content: Earn cashback or Fi-Coins every time you pay using UPI on Fi.

list.title: Wait no more ⚡️
list.content: Don’t wait hours to add a beneficiary. Just enter the account number and transfer money directly to the receiver’s bank account.

list.title: IFSC search on the app 🔎
list.content: Don’t head out to a different app to look for IFSC codes, just look them up right on the bank transfer page on your Fi app.

list.title: NEFT, RTGS, IMPS… we’ll do that math 💪
list.content: Don’t try choosing the payment method. Fi works out the most efficient way of sending money for your beneficiaries.

data.title: Have more questions?
data.description: Check out our FAQs.

data.title: Automate and forget
data.description: You know how you keep pushing your saving and investing plans to the next month? FIT rules can help you with that procrastination.

data.title: How does it work?
data.description: FIT Rules allow you to automatically move money from your savings account to mutual funds or jars. Just set up a rule once and watch your money grow.

list.title: Invest the change!
list.content: Set a rule to round up your transaction amount to the nearest 10s, 50s, or 100s and invest your spare change in gold, equity or debt mutual funds.

list.title: SIP 2.0
list.content: Set up an SIP to invest every month, week or even every day.

list.title: Save as you shop
list.content: Set a FIT rule to set aside a certain amount every time you shop.

list.title: Hit your savings out of the park
list.content: Set FIT rules to put aside savings every time Ronaldo scores a goal or when Kohli hits a 6.

list.title: Every day good habits
list.content: Have trouble sticking to a savings routine? Set a FIT rule to save every month, week or day.

list.title: Set and forget
list.content: Set a rule to ‘Pay rent to Sunil on the 1st of every month’ or ‘Pay Amma ₹10,000 every 2 months’

list.title: One rule is all it takes
list.content: Need to make a payment? Let FIT take care of it! Set a rule to 'pay Priya on the 5th' and you're sorted.

data.title: About Standard Plans
data.description: If you're a Min KYC account holder, you will only be able to access the 'Standard' Plan. On completing your Video KYC, you will be eligible to upgrade your Plan to 'Plus' or 'Infinite'

data.title: Not sure which Fi Plan works best for you?
data.description: Compare the different kinds of Plans that work best for you.

column_data: Salary Account with no minimum balance requirement
2% cash back on UPI & debit card spends (up to ₹500/month)
Your power account. Get more for less

If Last 12 months DC spends is
< 25K : ₹199 + GST
>= 25K : Waived off

Current - 0 Forex markup up to ₹50K spends every month
New - 0 Forex markup up to ₹30K spends every month

data.bottom_text:
*1X equals 5% of spends as Fi-Coins for Debit card, and 2.5% of spends as Fi-Coins for UPI merchant spends.

** 3.5% forex markup will be charged on all international debit card transactions at first. It will be reversed for eligible users within 30 days. All crypto transactions will be charged a 3.5% markup w.e.f. 8 March 2024 instead of the existing 2.5% markup.

***Cheque Book charges of ₹100 +GST will be collected from the user but reversed within 30 days.

There are no charges or penalties on Fi for not maintaining a minimum balance. We will just change your plan as per the minimum balance & we’ll notify you in the app.
